Integration service¶

This is an umbrella module covering ISIP, Insertion socio-professionnelle and Curriculum vitae.

Clients (view)¶

Internal name:integ.Clients (Clients)

Wie Kontakte –> Klienten, aber mit DSBE-spezifischen Kolonnen und Filterparametern.

Users with their Clients (view)¶

Internal name:integ.UsersWithClients (UsersWithClients)

Activity Report (view)¶

Internal name:integ.ActivityReport (ActivityReport)
